subject: Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games (2010)
lead_paragraph: The Penguins and Canada star Sidney Crosby said he was unhurt and headed to Vancouver for the Olympics despite being hit by a slap shot in Pittsburgh’s loss to Nashville.
snippet: The Penguins and Canada star Sidney Crosby said he was unhurt and headed to Vancouver for the Olympics despite being hit by a slap shot in Pittsburgh’s loss to Nashville.
